text: Zeppelin is a 1971 British World War I action adventure drama movie directed by Étienne Périer and starring Michael York, Elke Sommer, Peter Carsten, Marius Goring, Anton Diffring, Andrew Keir, Rupert Davies, Alexandra Stewart and Clive Morton. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and is rated PG in New Zealand. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 action movies Category:1971 adventure movies Category:1971 drama movies Category:1971 war movies Category:British action movies Category:British adventure movies Category:1970s British drama movies Category:British war movies Category:World War I movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies set in Norway Category:Movies set in Malta Category:Movies about air forces Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s spy movies
title: Zeppelin (movie)
